texto: 3 Terms and definitions For the purposes of this document, the terms and definitions given in ISO 9000 apply. NOTE 1 In ISO 9000:2005, the term product (3.4.2) is defined as the “result of a process”, where process (3.4.1) is defined as “set of interrelated or interacting activities which transforms inputs into outputs”. The term product encompasses four generic product categories: services, software, hardware, and processed materials. These terms are further described in ISO 9000. NOTE 2 Documents referenced outside the ISO 9000 family of standards might have terms and definitions that differ from those of ISO 9000.
